text:
The Directive LuaInherit(http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/mod_lua.html#luainherit) declaims that default value is parent-first(AP_LUA_INHERIT_PARENT_FIRST, 1), but in fact the default value is none(AP_LUA_INHERIT_NONE, 0). This will cause outputfilter not work at all, when LuaInherit is missing. Please check void *create_dir_config(apr_pool_t *p, char *dir), and set inherit with correct default value.

And last I hope httpd core teams should take more care about mod_lua, please.
creator: zhaozg@gmail.com

text:
Thx for the report.

Could you try the one-line patch in r1772489 ?
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
zhaozg@gmail.com
text: OK, r1772489 is work, and after merge this bug can be closed.
